base_info_app.apps module

class base_info_app.apps.BaseInfoAppConfig(app_name, app_module)

Bases: AppConfig

Configuration for the Base Info application. This class is used to set the default auto field and the name of the application.

default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
name = 'base_info_app'
